overview: The Kinkaids and the Harpers both run stage lines and are friendly competitors. Appleby is after the stage line and convinces the two owners to build a spur line to the same town. Then he has both projects sabotaged pitting the friends against each other and running them out of money.
tagline: Puttin' Yourselves Above The Law Is Goin' To Put You Under Tombstones!
title: Texas Stagecoach
